00084 #ifndef USB_ETH_HOOK_RX_START
00085 void rx_start_led(void);
00086 #define USB_ETH_HOOK_RX_START() rx_start_led()
00087 #endif
00088 
00089 #ifndef USB_ETH_HOOK_TX_END
00090 void tx_end_led(void);
00091 #define USB_ETH_HOOK_TX_END()   tx_end_led()
00092 #endif
00093 
00094

00098 #endif
